Avoid generic answers. Being funny in Spanish (or attempting to) goes a long way."]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2 text-sm","children":[["$","$L2e",null,{"size":"sm","className":"text-amber-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],"$L2f"]}]]}]}],"$L30"]}],"$L31"]}]}]}]
1d:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16 bg-muted/30","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl mx-auto","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-center gap-3 mb-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-pink-100 dark:bg-pink-900/30 flex items-center justify-center","children":["$","$L16",null,{"size":"lg","className":"text-pink-600 dark:text-pink-400"}]}],["$","div",null,{"children":[["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold","children":"Argentine Dating Culture"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":"What to expect (and what not to)"}]]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"space-y-6","children":[["$","div","0",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"The 'Coffee Date' Doesn't Exist"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground mb-4","children":"Argentines don't do casual coffee first dates. I panicked—back home, meeting parents was a 'we're getting married' moment. Here, it just meant I was someone she wanted them to meet. Her mom asked when we were having kids. I nearly choked on my chorizo."]}]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2 text-sm","children":[["$","$L32",null,{"size":"sm","className":"text-amber-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":[["$","strong",null,{"children":"Pro tip:"}]," ","Bring wine or dessert. The 'what are we' conversation happens early, and it's usually assumed you're not seeing other people."}],"$L33","$undefined"]}]}],"$L34","$L35"]}]]}]}]}]

Many porteños have been in therapy for years. 22:["$","section",null,{"className":"py-16","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"container mx-auto px-4","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"max-w-3xl gatherings"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• Don't say 'gracias' when passing mate"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• Bring something when visiting homes"}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• Expect less personal space"}],["$","li",null,{"children":["• Group hangouts ",">"," one-on-one initially"]}],["$","li",null,{"children":"• Compliment the asador at BBQs"}]]}]]}]]}]}]}]]}]}]}]

44:["$","div","3",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"Invitation Etiquette"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground mb-4","children":"If you're invited to someone's home, bring something. Never arrive empty-handed."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-amber-50 dark:bg-amber-950/20 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-amber-400 mb-4","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm italic","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"font-semibold not-italic","children":"Personal story:"}]," ","I showed up to my first asado with just myself. The host was too polite to say anything, but I noticed everyone else brought wine or sides. Felt like a jerk. Now I always bring Malbec or a dessert from a good bakery."]}]}],"$undefined"]}]}]
45:["$","div","4",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"Gift Giving"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground mb-4","children":"Small gifts are common when visiting homes. For birthdays, dinners out are more common than gifts. Don't overthink it."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-amber-50 dark:bg-amber-950/20 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-amber-400 mb-4","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm italic","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"font-semibold not-italic","children":"Personal story:"}]," ","I brought an expensive gift to a birthday dinner, thinking that was normal. The recipient was embarrassed and didn't open it. Later, a friend explained that making a fuss over gifts is awkward here. A nice bottle of wine or covering their dinner is preferred."]}]}],"$undefined"]}]}]
46:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex items-start gap-2 text-sm","children":[["$","$L32",null,{"size":"sm","className":"text-amber-500 flex-shrink-0 mt-0.5"}],["$","span",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground","children":"Many therapists work on a sliding scale. Spanish fluency helps, but some speak English."}]]}]
47:["$","div","3",{"data-slot":"card","className":"bg-card text-card-foreground flex flex-col gap-6 rounded-xl border py-6 shadow-sm","children":["$","div",null,{"data-slot":"card-content","className":"px-6 pt-6","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"font-semibold text-lg mb-2","children":"When to Visit Home"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-muted-foreground mb-4","children":"Most successful expats go home every 3-4 months at first. It prevents the 'trapped' feeling and reminds you why you left."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"bg-teal-50 dark:bg-teal-950/20 p-4 rounded-lg border-l-4 border-teal-400 mb-4","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-sm italic","children":[["$","span",null,{"className":"font-semibold not-italic","children":"Personal story:"}]," ","I tried to be a hero and stay for six months straight. By month five, I was miserable and questioning everything. Went home for a week, saw family, ate familiar food, and came back refreshed. Now I schedule visits quarterly. It's not failure—it's maintenance."]}]}],"$undefined"]}]}]
